name: karma-typescript
description: Simplifying running unit tests with coverage for Typescript projects.
author: monounity

scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:examples && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:examples: npm run test:examples:angular2 && npm run test:examples:angularjs && npm run test:examples:mocha && npm run test:examples:typescript-1.6.2 && npm run test:examples:typescript-latest
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:tests:integration-1.8.10 && npm run test:tests:integration-latest
scripts.dev: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run setup:kt && npm test
scripts.setup: npm i && npm run build && npm run setup:examples && npm run setup:tests
scripts.setup:examples: npm run setup:examples:angular2 && npm run setup:examples:angularjs && npm run setup:examples:mocha && npm run setup:examples:typescript-1.6.2 && npm run setup:examples:typescript-1.6.2 && npm run setup:examples:typescript-latest
scripts.setup:tests: npm run setup:tests:integration-1.8.10 && npm run setup:tests:integration-latest
scripts.setup:kt: npm run setup:kt:examples && npm run setup:kt:tests
scripts.setup:kt:examples: npm run setup:kt:examples:angular2 && npm run setup:kt:examples:angularjs && npm run setup:kt:examples:mocha && npm run setup:kt:examples:typescript-1.6.2 && npm run setup:kt:examples:typescript-1.6.2 && npm run setup:kt:examples:typescript-latest
scripts.setup:kt:tests: npm run setup:kt:tests:integration-1.8.10 && npm run setup:kt:tests:integration-latest
scripts.dev:examples:angular2: npm run build && npm run setup:kt:examples:angular2 && npm run test:examples:angular2
scripts.dev:examples:angularjs: npm run build && npm run setup:kt:examples:angularjs && npm run test:examples:angularjs
scripts.dev:examples:mocha: npm run build && npm run setup:kt:examples:mocha && npm run test:examples:mocha
scripts.dev:examples:typescript-1.6.2: npm run build && npm run setup:kt:examples:typescript-1.6.2 && npm run test:examples:typescript-1.6.2
scripts.dev:examples:typescript-latest: npm run build && npm run setup:kt:examples:typescript-latest && npm run test:examples:typescript-latest
scripts.test:tests:integration-1.8.10: npm --prefix tests/integration-1.8.10 test && npm --prefix tests/integration-1.8.10 run test:angular2 && npm --prefix tests/integration-1.8.10 run test:react
scripts.dev:tests:integration-1.8.10: npm run build && npm run setup:kt:tests:integration-1.8.10 && npm run test:tests:integration-1.8.10
scripts.test:tests:integration-latest: npm --prefix tests/integration-latest test && npm --prefix tests/integration-latest run test:angular2 && npm --prefix tests/integration-latest run test:core && npm --prefix tests/integration-latest run test:emptyfile && npm --prefix tests/integration-latest run test:no-module && npm --prefix tests/integration-latest run test:react
scripts.dev:tests:integration-latest: npm run build && npm run setup:kt:tests:integration-latest && npm run test:tests:integration-latest
